attributes.action: recognise that the laws of Great Britain and those passed by parliament and administered by the British courts are the only recognised laws of this country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These laws and courts are not based on colour creed or religious inclination and that the majority of the people of this country do not desire laws which are.  We further call upon him to make it clear that the majority of the people who live in this land support these laws and courts and until that majority chose otherwise through referendum all people who have chosen to live in this land are bound by these laws and courts and no other.
